articles.title: ’Escorted Off the Property’: Golf World Reacts to Bizarre Nelly Korda Moment - EssentiallySports
articles.description: In a bizarre moment, the shot from Nelly Korda was picked up by a fan at The Amundi Evian Championship held in France. Twitter fans reacted:
articles.content: Golf rules are complicated. But what transpired at The Amundi Evian Championship was wrongfully amusing. In a moment of disbelief, American golfer Nelly Korda made a shot that was picked up by a fan … [+2533 chars]
